ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and there will be dark-eyed maidens with them with eyes reserved for them alone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: With companions of modest look, the same in age, by their side.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and wherein there shall be with them well-matched, bashful mates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will have bashful wives of equal age with them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And with them are the pure spouses, who do not set gaze upon men except their husbands, of single age.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And beside them will be Qasirat-at-Tarf, (and) of equal ages.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And with them shall be those restraining their eyes, equals in age.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and with them maidens restraining their glances of equal age.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And with them are those of modest gaze, companions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: with them, they will have pure, modest women of an equal age.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And with them will be virgins of refraining looks and of equal age.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and there will be with them maidens of restrained glances, of a like age.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And beside them will be chaste women restraining their glances, (companions) of equal age.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And beside them will be chaste females (virgins) restraining their glances only for their husbands, (and) of equal ages.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And with them will be maidens of equal age with modest gaze.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: With them will be attendants with modest gaze, of same age.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances and of equal age.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:52] And with them [there] will be maidens of restrained glances, restricting their eyes to their spouses, of a like age, of the same age, girls who are thirty three years of age (atrāb is the plural of tirb).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And with them are those of modest gaze) wives who are content with their husbands, (companions) who are of the same age.
